attributes.action: amend the Sex Offenders Act, so as anybody convicted of sexual crimes will be placed on the Sex Offenders Register for the duration of their natural life.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While the Sex Offenders Register is far from adequate, it is a tool aimed at preventing paedophiles re-offending. Therefore, once anybody has committed such a crime, if they are to be released, they should be placed on the Register for life.
